etymology.description: 丆 is a variant form of 厂, which is the simplified form of 廠
etymology.interpretation: 丆 is used as a simplified variant of 厂 to represent the same concept. 厂 itself stems from 廠 (chǎng, "factory"), which is a phono-semantic compound combining 广 (guǎng, "shelter") with 敞 (chǎng, "open"), indicating an open shelter or space.
